db:info.db:title: BarDataProxy QML Type
db:info.db:edition: Qt Data Visualization | Commercial or GPLv3

db:abstract.db:para: The data proxy for a 3D bars graph.
This type was introduced in QtDataVisualization 1.0.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: This type handles adding, inserting, changing, and removing rows of data with Qt Quick 2.
This type is uncreatable, but contains properties that are exposed via subtypes.
For a more complete description, see QBarDataProxy.

db:section.db:title: columnLabels : list
db:section.db:para: The optional column labels for the array. Indexes in this array match column indexes in rows. If the list is shorter than the longest row, all columns will not get labels.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] rowCount : int
db:section.db:para: The number of rows in the array.

db:section.db:title: rowLabels : list
db:section.db:para: The optional row labels for the array. Indexes in this array match the row indexes in the data array. If the list is shorter than the number of rows, all rows will not get labels.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] series : Bar3DSeries
db:section.db:para: The series this proxy is attached to.
